text: The minister of Health, formerly style minister in the Government of Koshi Province and leads the ministry of Health. The minister for Health is responsible for healthcare in the Koshi Province and related services. The incumbent minister is Nirmala Limbu, took office on 9 January 2023. == List of office-holders == ; Key * * * Minister Party Term of office Chief Minister(s) Ref Portrait Name Took office Left office Term 1 Jay Ram Yadav People's Socialist Party, Nepal November 2, 2021 January 9, 2023 Morang Rajendra Kumar Rai 2 Nirmala Limbu People's Socialist Party, Nepal January 9, 2023 May 31, 2023 Taplejung Hikmat Kumar Karki 3 Til Kumar Menyangbo Limbu CPN (Unified Marxistâ€“Leninist) May 31, 2023 Incumbent == Related pages == * Government of Koshi Province == References == === Notes === == Other websites == * official Website of Ministry of Health of Koshi Province * Government of Koshi Province Category:Koshi Province
title: Minister for Health (Koshi Province)
